title: Chiropractors Told to Stop Pretending They Can Treat Covid-19
description: Chiropractors in Canada and elsewhere are being told to stop advertising their services as a treatment for covid-19, the illness caused by the new coronavirus. Read more...
content: Chiropractors in Canada and elsewhere are being told to stop advertising their services as a treatment for covid the illness caused by the new coronavirus In Canada organizations such as the College of Chiropractors of Ontario have sent dozens of warni chars
